Access by appt. only.|5CBPF. 508 Camera, Gianni di Venanzo; music, Roman Vlad; editor, Mario Serandrei. 511 1 Jose Suarez (Vito); Rosanna Schiaffino (Assunta); Nino Vingelli (Gennaro); Pasquale Cennamo, Decimo Cristiani, José Jaspe. 518 Filmed on the streets of Naples. 520 "Story is based on recent real-life happening. It tells of a young man who tries to break into, then double-cross, the combine which dominates supply and sales at Naples' fruit and vegetable mart. Finale finds him shot by gang boss, and his young and recent wife a desperate widow"-- Variety review, September 17, 1958. 538 VHS NTSC. 541 0 PFA 0500-01-8138. D0106 546 In Italian with English subtitles. 562 Shortened (87 min.) version?
